vote.title: Authorize (1) a Small Business Microgrants Program Statement for microgrants ($5,000.00 or less) to eligible small businesses in Dallas for assistance with qualified operational expenses incurred between March 3, 2021 and September 30, 2024 due to COVID-19 pandemic to mitigate negative financial impact from the COVID-19 pandemic; and (2) the allocation of funds for the Small Business Microgrants Program - Not to exceed $230,000.00 - Financing: American Rescue Plan Act Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Fund
vote.description: Authorize (1) a Small Business Microgrants Program Statement for microgrants ($5,000.00 or less) to eligible small businesses in Dallas for assistance with qualified operational expenses incurred between March 3, 2021 and September 30, 2024 due to COVID-19 pandemic to mitigate negative financial impact from the COVID-19 pandemic; and (2) the allocation of funds for the Small Business Microgrants Program - Not to exceed $230,000.00 - Financing: American Rescue Plan Act Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Fund
